events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it doesn't fit and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request has been identified as a refund inquiry due to product return and money back request.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah for handling the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your refund request for the jacket that doesn't fit.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the product is unused and in original packaging to proceed with the refund?
My order number is 123456789. The jacket is still new, with tags and in the original packaging, ready to be returned.
Thank you for the information. We will arrange a pickup for the jacket and process your refund within 5 business days after we receive the item.
That sounds great, thank you! I appreciate the quick assistance with my refund.
The refund case is now closed on our side. Please expect pickup confirmation via email shortly.
Just checking in to confirm if you have received the refund for your returned jacket as promised.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you for your excellent support throughout the process.
We would appreciate if you could fill out a quick survey about your refund experience to help us improve.
I completed the survey and gave positive feedback because of how smoothly everything was handled.
Closing the case following successful refund processing and positive customer feedback.
The refund case has been archived in the system after 30 days of closure.
